scripts.deploy-private: ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.private npx hardhat run  --network theta_privatenet scripts/deploy-upgradeable.ts
scripts.deploy-test: ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.test npx hardhat run  --network theta_testnet scripts/deploy-upgradeable.ts
scripts.upgrade-private: ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.private npx hardhat run  --network theta_privatenet scripts/upgrade-box.ts
scripts.upgrade-test: ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env.test npx hardhat run  --network theta_testnet scripts/upgrade-box.ts
